Message: I decided to set off on a journey—

a harsh and grueling journey to
the farthest corners of the world.

But, everyone from my village
just laughed at me, saying,
“There’s no way lazy lil’
Eureka can do that!”

They even said,
“I bet she’ll come back
as soon as she gets hungry”...
Uuu... I am a tad bit lazy...

I won’t go home until
my map is complete!

Besides, I have my own unique
Eureka pace of doing things!

As the wind blows,
and my spirit flows,
it’s okay if my progress is slow!
I’ll just get tired if I try
to rush anyway, right~?

And so begins Eureka’s
big journey across the world~
Yaaaay~!

But...I’m a bit tired now...
So, I’ll start my journey
with a break~
